```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(SpatialEpi)
library(sf)
x <- st_as_sf(pennLC$spatial.polygon)

bins <- c(100, 200, 500, 1000)
pal <- colorBin("YlOrRd", domain = pennLC$data, bins = bins)

y <- pennLC$data

w <- merge(x,y)

m <- leaflet(x) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(w$cases),
    weight = 2,
  opacity = 1,
  color = "white",
  dashArray = "3",
  fillOpacity = 0.7)

m

```
